# Python

* [**W3Schools**](https://www.w3schools.com/python/default.asp): A great starting point for beginners with Python basics and simple examples.
* [**Real Python**](https://realpython.com/): Comprehensive tutorials and advanced topics for a deeper dive into the language.

# Software Development

* [**W3Schools Git Tutorial**](https://www.w3schools.com/git/default.asp): An easy-to-follow introduction to the fundamentals of version control with Git.
